## Summary

A short title and one-sentence description of the requested feature.

- **Short title**:
- **Area of the CRM**

## Problem to Solve

Describe the problem or workflow pain point, not just the solution.

- **What are you trying to do today?**
- **What makes this difficult or time-consuming?**

## Proposed Solution (Optional)

If you have an idea of how it could work, describe it here.

- **How you’d like it to work**:
- **Any similar tools or examples you’ve seen**:

## Value / Impact

Help us prioritize the request.

- **Who would use this feature?**
- **How often would you use it?** (Daily / Weekly / Monthly / Rarely)
- **What happens if you don’t get this feature?**

## Priority

- **How important is this?** (Nice to have / Important / Critical)
